Female: Metrorrhagia, with violent irritation of rectum and bladder, and prolapsus uteri

Menorrhagia; profuse leucorrhoea; BLOODY LOCHIA RETURNS AFTER LEAST MOTION, comes in gushes; between periods, LEUCORRHOEA WITH URINARY IRRITATION; pregnant women with "weak uterus;" a bloody discharge on slight exertion
Bleeding hemorrhoids; nosebleed instead of menses

name: Erigeron
details: Hemorrhages are caused and cured by this remedy. Persistent hemorrhage from the bladder. Hemorrhage from the uterus, with painful micturition. PROFUSE BRIGHT-RED BLOOD. Pain in left ovary and hip. Chronic gonorrhea, with burning micturition; continual dribbling. DYSENTERY, with soreness and burning in bladder. TYMPANITES.
